alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 30 at 1:23PM PST until January 01 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Snow accumulations of 7 to 14 inches across northern Elko county, especially the western sections including the Jarbidge wilderness. For the Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range, 2 to 3 feet. * WHERE...Northern Elko county and the Ruby Mountains/East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...Now through 4 PM Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
